Dear client,
I’m please to inform you that your application has been accepted, as such you are now a marked down in my personal records as a test subject of one of my latest products. You specified in your application that your motivations are to “Have a better tolerance to hot climates” as said in your letter to me, it a very intriguing request is I do say so myself. Within this package you should find the product that should assist you with this hopefully it helps you when the weather gets hot. Regarding the debt that you own me, I’ll forget all about it as long as you consume the product within three days. I also want to remind you that any mention of my program to anyone who is not part of my program is strictly prohibited, and if this agreement is broken your body will be claimed as collateral and used to further my research into the genetic material I have obtained for Merra.
Please enjoy your new body.
Sincerely,
Madam Eris
